direct_mask_range_hashing Interface

A mask range-hashing class (uses a bit-mask).

Notification methods.

void
  notify_resized
  (size_type size)

Operators.

MethodDescription
inline size_type
  operator()
  (size_type hash) const

Transforms the hash value hash into a ranged-hash value (using a bit-mask).
